headline: CYGNVS launches AI Model for Cyber Readiness and Response
summary: CYGNVS today announced the availability of the CYGNVS AI model for cyber readiness and incident response, a breakthrough in purpose-built AI trained on tens of thousands of real-world incidents and outages that delivers customer incident-specific guidance to help organizations make faster and smarter decisions during crises.

headline: Gartner forecasts downbeat annual results on slowing demand at consulting unit
summary: IT research firm Gartner on Tuesday forecast annual revenue and earnings below Wall Street ​expectations, as enterprises scaling back their spending dampened ‌demand for its consulting services. Shares of the Stamford, Connecticut-based firm were down ‌5.1% in premarket trading following the results. Businesses have been tightening their spending budgets amid economic headwinds and choppy customer demand.

content.title: Gartner forecasts downbeat annual results on slowing demand at consulting unit
content.summary: IT research firm Gartner on Tuesday forecast annual revenue and earnings below Wall Street ​expectations, as enterprises scaling back their spending dampened ‌demand for its consulting services. Shares of the Stamford, Connecticut-based firm were down ‌5.1% in premarket trading following the results. Businesses have been tightening their spending budgets amid economic headwinds and choppy customer demand.

headline: Gartner’s (NYSE:IT) Q4 CY2025 Earnings Results: Revenue In Line With Expectations
summary: Research and advisory firm Gartner (NYSE:IT) met Wall Streets revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 2.2% year on year to $1.75 billion. Its GAAP profit of $3.36 per share was 4.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Stocks to Watch Tuesday: PayPal, PepsiCo, AMD, Disney
summary: ↘️ Pfizer (PFE): The drugmaker reported lower quarterly sales and swung to a loss, as demand for its Covid-19 vaccine and antiviral drug continued to decline. Shares lost about 4%. ↘️ NXP Semiconductors (NXPI): The Dutch chip maker reported higher quarterly sales and guided for further revenue growth, as management sees rising demand.

content.title: Stocks to Watch Tuesday: PayPal, PepsiCo, AMD, Disney

Shares lost about 4%. ↘️ NXP Semiconductors (NXPI): The Dutch chip maker reported higher quarterly sales and guided for further revenue growth, as management sees rising demand.

headline: Gartner Stock Falls Sharply on Disappointing Guidance
summary: Gartner shares plummeted Tuesday after the company reported lower fourth-quarter earnings and provided 2026 guidance that came in below Wall Street expectations.  The research and advisory company early Tuesday said it expects total revenue of $6.46 billion in 2026, down from $6.5 billion in 2025 and below analyst forecasts of $6.71 billion.  Net income is expected to rise to around $809 million in 2026, up from the $729 million in 2025 but below analyst forecasts of a greater rise to $979.4 million, according to FactSet.

content.title: Gartner Stock Falls Sharply on Disappointing Guidance
content.summary: Gartner shares plummeted Tuesday after the company reported lower fourth-quarter earnings and provided 2026 guidance that came in below Wall Street expectations.  The research and advisory company early Tuesday said it expects total revenue of $6.46 billion in 2026, down from $6.5 billion in 2025 and below analyst forecasts of $6.71 billion.  Net income is expected to rise to around $809 million in 2026, up from the $729 million in 2025 but below analyst forecasts of a greater rise to $979.4 million, according to FactSet.
